data.header: What is vpl - Weekly Esports Arena?
contentList: Weekly Esports Arena is a chance to give our players a platform to make a name for themselves in the Esports Community. The idea of hosting a weekly tournament is to cultivate an esports culture and build the existing gaming community for all our vpl games.
